constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 62 (Monday, April 12, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Ms. NEWMAN:
H.R. 2450.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Clause 1 of Section 8 of Article I of the Unuited States
Constitution
[Page H1727]

latestAction.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to except certain individuals from the 80 percent taxable income limitation on net operating loss carryovers.
